title: Motor Rock 2013 Steam-Rip MULTi2-RG GameWorks
description:
:::::: RG GameWorks PRESENTS :::::::


:::: Motor Rock 2013 Steam-Rip MULTi2-RG GameWorks ::::


::Information::


Release Date : December 16, 2013
Genre: Racing
Developer: Team Yard
Publisher: Yard Team
Platform: PC
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip]
Language: English, Russian
Language: English, Russian
Tablet: Present [ALI213 / Joker1659]


::Description::


Crazy battle races in perspective under the deafening roar of the engines 
and rock experiencing a rebirth! Our game is in full 3D and recreates the 
spirit of old-school gameplay best racing games 90s, among them, of course, 
is the main representative of Rock'n'Roll Racing.


::System Requirements::


OS: WIndows XP,7,8 
Processor: 1,5 Ghz 
Memory: 256 MB RAM 
Graphics: Geforce 6200 128 mb 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Network: Broadband Internet connection 
Hard Drive: 500 MB available space


::Installation Steps::


1. Download the torrent.

2. Disable your anti-virus and firewall for false positive disturbance.

3. Install the game by running setup.exe

4. Content the Crack Contents from folder NoDVD to the main game directory.

5. Play [Change the language from ALI213.ini to English if you need to]

6. Support the Developers if you like the game.


::Uploader Notes::


Finally it came out, remake of the good old rock'n'roll-Racing, 

which made over the years for the fans of the game.
